Generation V.Black: It can make its breath freeze at will. Very able in the water, it swims around in northern seas and catches prey.
Generation V.White: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.
Generation V.Black 2: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.
Generation V.White 2: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.

Generation VI.X: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.
Generation VI.Y: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.

Generation VIII.Sword: It swims through frigid seas, searching for prey. From its frozen breath, it forms icy fangs that are harder than steel.
Generation VIII.Shield: It swims energetically through frigid seas. When it gets tired, it freezes the seawater with its breath so it can rest on the ice.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It is a ferocious, carnivorous Pokémon. Once it captures its prey, it will breathe cold air onto the prey to freeze and preserve it.
Generation IX.Violet: Feared as the Snow-White Demon in northern lands, Beartic uses its frosty claws and fangs to attack prey.
